snippet: The indie publisher NoBrow is celebrating This Is Not a Pop-Up, its two-week takeover of the Hayward Gallery Shop at Southbank Centre, with an evening that includes live illustrators, musicians and its unusual publications.
abstract: The indie publisher NoBrow is celebrating This Is Not a Pop-Up, its two-week takeover of the Hayward Gallery Shop at Southbank Centre, with an evening that includes live illustrators, musicians and its unusual publications.
lead_paragraph: NoBrow, a Shoreditch-based bookshop and indie publishing company that has two imprints, is known for its graphic novels and other projects created in collaboration with illustrators all over the world. Their output ranges from hardcover books to wrapping paper to handmade books, produced with particular attention to color, printing and paper quality. The result is items that are as much works of art as recreational distractions.

headline.main: In London, a Pop-Up That's Not a Pop-Up
